Apparantly, the message archive for the gladiator tournament group is 
offline.  I am going to look at solving that problem.

Deathifier, can you email me the part of your code for the scenario 
converter that deals with extracting the information from the scenario 
file and putting into a text file?

I seem to be having problems with string manipulation in VB and I was 
hoping looking at the solution in C might give me inspiration.
